text: Related to some smart stories, I guess. Interesting tech regardless. <http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2014/07/24/sense-sleep_n_5616939.html?&ncid=tweetlnkushpmg00000046>

attachments.title: New Sleep Gadget Tracks Pretty Much Everything In Your Bedroom
attachments.text: There are already a lot of ways to track sleep, from fitness trackers to sensors to phone apps. But if you want to get really serious about this stuff, you have to start tracking your bedroom, too. That's the idea behind a new product called Sense...
attachments.fallback: The Huffington Post: New Sleep Gadget Tracks Pretty Much Everything In Your Bedroom
